hero.title: Build a <highlight>smarter TOEIC plan</highlight> for yourself
hero.description: In just <minutes>35 minutes</minutes> with the <mini>55-question Mini TOEIC</mini>, we estimate your <score>TOEIC score (0–990)</score>, place you in <level>Level 1–3</level>, and recommend a <highlight>personalized study plan</highlight>.
hero.meta: * After the test you’ll receive a <report>detailed report</report> and a <plan>personalized roadmap</plan> via email.

notifications.loginRequired: Please sign in to take the Mini TOEIC 55-question test
notifications.attemptExists: You’ve already taken the Placement Test

workflow.title: Master TOEIC in four focused steps
workflow.description: From gauging your level to finally hitting your target score.

steps.title: Take the Placement Test
steps.desc: Finish the Mini TOEIC 55-question test in 35 minutes to capture your current level.

steps.title: Receive your roadmap
steps.desc: We estimate your TOEIC score and craft a personalized plan based on your weak spots.

steps.title: Train by part
steps.desc: Practice each part with exercises filtered by the right difficulty for your level.

steps.title: Track progress
steps.desc: Review detailed reports, analyze mistakes, and see improvements over time.

testimonials.title: Thousands have boosted their scores
testimonials.description: Real experiences and real results from learners on our platform.

items.name: Ngọc Hân
items.quote: After the placement test the system showed my weak Parts 2 & 3, so I doubled down there. Super effective!

items.name: Trung Kiên
items.quote: Levels are crystal clear, so I always practice at the right difficulty. Listening improved a ton after one month.

items.name: Mai Linh
items.quote: New tests, detailed explanations, and progress reports after every session—it feels like having a private coach.

impact.summary: <percent>98%</percent> of learners improve their score after <duration>4 weeks</duration> of consistent practice.

pricing.title: Choose the plan that fits you

faq.title: Have questions? We’re ready to help
faq.description: Find quick answers about our TOEIC learning platform.

items.question: Is the Placement Test free?
items.answer: Yes. Take the Placement Test for free to understand your current level.

items.question: How many times can I take the Placement Test?
items.answer: You can take it once to get your initial roadmap. If you need another attempt later, contact support.

items.question: How is the roadmap personalized?
items.answer: We analyze strengths and weaknesses from your Placement Test and recommend Parts/Levels that match your ability.

items.question: What makes Premium different from Free?
items.answer: Premium unlocks unlimited practice, full test explanations, AI/Admin chat, file downloads, deeper analytics, and priority support.

items.question: Can I cancel Premium anytime?
items.answer: Yes. Cancel whenever you want and keep Premium access until the billing cycle ends.

items.question: Is the platform available in English?
items.answer: The interface is optimized for Vietnamese learners, but all tests and questions stay in English like the real TOEIC.

finalCta.title: Ready to own your TOEIC goal?
finalCta.description: Start training today, track your progress, and hit the score you’re aiming for.

brand.description: ToeicPrep blends placement tests, adaptive practice, and live study rooms so you always know what to study next.

meta.title: Online TOEIC Preparation - Real Tests, Instant Scoring
meta.description: Practice TOEIC online with thousands of real questions. Take mock tests, get instant scores, and detailed explanations. Learn vocabulary, listening, and reading effectively.
meta.keywords: TOEIC, TOEIC preparation, mock TOEIC, learn TOEIC online, TOEIC practice test, TOEIC listening, TOEIC reading, TOEIC vocabulary, TOEIC online, TOEIC test preparation

faq.question: What is TOEIC PREP?
faq.answer: TOEIC PREP is an online TOEIC preparation platform with thousands of real questions to help you best prepare for the TOEIC exam.

faq.question: How do I start preparing for TOEIC?
faq.answer: You can sign up for a free account and start taking mock TOEIC tests immediately. The system will assess your level and suggest a suitable study plan.

faq.question: What are the parts of the TOEIC test?
faq.answer: The TOEIC test consists of 7 parts: Part 1 (Photographs), Part 2 (Question-Response), Part 3 (Conversations), Part 4 (Talks), Part 5 (Incomplete Sentences), Part 6 (Text Completion), Part 7 (Reading Comprehension).

1.title: Part 1 – Photographs
1.description: Practice TOEIC Part 1 - Photographs. Listen and choose the sentence that best describes the picture.
1.keywords: TOEIC, TOEIC part.1, TOEIC practice, TOEIC test, Part 1 – Photographs

2.title: Part 2 – Question–Response
2.description: Practice TOEIC Part 2 - Question-Response. Listen to questions and choose the most appropriate answer.
2.keywords: TOEIC, TOEIC part.2, TOEIC practice, TOEIC test, Part 2 – Question–Response

3.title: Part 3 – Conversations
3.description: Practice TOEIC Part 3 - Conversations. Listen to short conversations and answer questions.
3.keywords: TOEIC, TOEIC part.3, TOEIC practice, TOEIC test, Part 3 – Conversations

4.title: Part 4 – Talks
4.description: Practice TOEIC Part 4 - Short Talks. Listen to short talks and answer related questions.
4.keywords: TOEIC, TOEIC part.4, TOEIC practice, TOEIC test, Part 4 – Talks

5.title: Part 5 – Incomplete Sentences
5.description: Practice TOEIC Part 5 - Incomplete Sentences. Practice grammar and vocabulary to complete sentences correctly.
5.keywords: TOEIC, TOEIC part.5, TOEIC practice, TOEIC test, Part 5 – Incomplete Sentences

6.title: Part 6 – Text Completion
6.description: Practice TOEIC Part 6 - Text Completion. Practice reading and filling in appropriate words in blanks.
6.keywords: TOEIC, TOEIC part.6, TOEIC practice, TOEIC test, Part 6 – Text Completion

7.title: Part 7 – Reading Comprehension
7.description: Practice TOEIC Part 7 - Reading Comprehension. Practice reading long passages and answering comprehension questions.
7.keywords: TOEIC, TOEIC part.7, TOEIC practice, TOEIC test, Part 7 – Reading Comprehension

comparison.matchMsg: Placement test score is quite close to your reported TOEIC score.
comparison.matchSub: You reported: {reported} points • Placement test estimated: {placement} points (difference of about {diff} points). The system will use the placement result to suggest a detailed roadmap for each Part.
comparison.mediumMsg: Placement test score slightly deviates from your reported TOEIC score.
comparison.mediumSub: You reported: {reported} points • Placement test estimated: {placement} points (difference of about {diff} points). This may be due to different timing from the real exam, your reported score being old, or the placement test having only 55 questions. The system still prioritizes the placement test for roadmap suggestions.
comparison.largeMsg: Placement test score deviates significantly from your reported TOEIC score.
comparison.largeSub: You reported: {reported} points • Placement test estimated: {placement} points (difference of about {diff} points). This may be due to lack of focus, your reported score being old, or this being just an estimate from 55 questions. The system will prioritize the placement result for current level assessment. If you feel the result is inaccurate, practice for a while and retake the progress test for a more stable assessment.
